top_reviews.author: Vaishu Mugutwala
top_reviews.text:
Dr. Rinkal Patel is one of the best doctors we have met in Ahmedabad. I was fortunate to meet her at  someone else’s clinic, and since then, we have formed an unbreakable bond.

Speaking about my journey, I was RA positive, and Dr. Rinkal Patel has always given me strength. My case was very complicated, as I have been on medication for arthritis. Despite her busy schedule, she was always available 24/7 for me, understanding my condition and ensuring I received the best care possible.

What sets Dr. Rinkal Patel apart is not just her medical expertise but also her compassionate and patient-friendly approach. She listens attentively, explains medical conditions in a simple and understandable manner, and always prioritizes her patients' well-being. Her dedication to her profession is truly inspiring, as she goes beyond just prescribing medicines—she provides emotional support, reassurance, and the motivation needed to fight through difficult times.

Her professionalism, responsibility, and caring nature make her more than just a doctor—she is a true guardian of her patients' health. Whether it’s a late-night emergency or a moment of doubt, she never hesitates to guide and support her patients with empathy and kindness. We are truly grateful to have found such a dedicated and exceptional doctor.
Because of her guidance and support, I gave birth to a baby girl on February 3rd this year. I am deeply grateful to her from the bottom of my heart.

top_reviews.text: We had a wonderful experience with Dr. Rinkal Patel. Her care, communication, and medical expertise were top-notch. Despite her busy schedule, she was always available 24/7 for me, understanding my condition and ensuring I received the best care possible. Today, we are holding our baby with joy and gratitude in our hearts!

We had the best experience at Poorva Women Hospital during my wife's delivery. Dr. Dhara Patel and her entire team were incredibly supportive, calm, and professional throughout the journey. From the very first consultation to the delivery day, they ensured we felt comfortable and well cared for.

top_reviews.author: Janki Raval
top_reviews.text:
My husband also wrote review and I am also writing it as a pregnant patient how I felt. Today was my first visit to this hospital as a pregnant patient, and what should have been a routine checkup turned into an upsetting experience.

After my consultation, the doctor asked for blood and urine tests. I followed the instructions and collected my urine sample as requested. But when I returned with the clean, sealed container, I was told to place it under a table—right beside a dustbin. Later, when the lab technician arrived, I was asked to pick it up myself and hand it over.

As someone who is pregnant and already navigating the physical and emotional challenges that come with it, I was shocked. I expected care, compassion, and professionalism—what I experienced instead was disregard and a lack of basic support. Why should a pregnant patient be expected to bend down and retrieve a sample, especially when staff are present and capable?

What hurt even more was the response I received when I brought this up with Dr. Dhara Patel. She told me that neither she nor her staff ever touch urine samples, as if that was completely normal. Honestly, I was stunned. Is this how patients—especially vulnerable ones—are treated here?

This may seem like a small incident to some, but it left me feeling disrespected and uncared for in a place where I had hoped to feel safe and supported. I truly hope the hospital takes this seriously and reflects on how patients, especially those expecting, are being treated.

top_reviews.author: Bhushan Borse
top_reviews.text: We are incredibly grateful to Poorva Women's Hospital for their exceptional care and support throughout our maternity journey. The doctors and staff were extremely professional, compassionate, and supportive at every step. Thanks to their expert guidance, we had a smooth and successful normal delivery. Highly recommend this hospital for anyone seeking the best maternity care.

Magical birthing experience! Excellent care and recovery by Dr Pooja and team.

From the moment we walked in for the first consultation, we knew we were in good hands. Dr. Pooja’s positivity and expert advice made each milestone pregnancy scan memorable and full of hope — and together, we accomplished a positive pregnancy.

Each part of the journey was thoroughly explained— and Dr Pooja was more than happy to answer all our questions and smallest concerns. We looked forward to our appointments and interactions with her every few weeks.

top_reviews.author: Kesha Goti
top_reviews.text:
Would anyone believe if I said that delivering a baby could be as easy and joyful as going to the movies? Sounds unbelievable, right?

But that’s exactly how my experience was at Jariwala Hospital. I recently had my C-section done there, and it turned out to be one of the most beautiful and memorable moments of my life. The entire birthing process was handled with such care and expertise that it truly felt magical.

Dr. Mahesh Jariwala is changing the narrative around childbirth—challenging the old stereotypes that natural birth is always better than a C-section. His calm approach, clinical precision, and empathetic care made me feel completely safe, informed, and supported throughout the journey.

If you ever thought C-sections had to be stressful or traumatic, Jariwala Hospital will prove otherwise. It’s not just a hospital—it’s a place where new life begins with joy, dignity, and compassion.

top_reviews.author: mitul jain
top_reviews.text:
"Dr. Mahesh Jariwala is undoubtedly one of the finest gynecologists and surgeons in Ahmedabad. His approach to patient care sets him apart from others in the field. When my wife was eight months pregnant, our previous doctor recommended an immediate cesarean delivery due to low amniotic fluid and the baby’s breech position. Understandably, this news left us unprepared and anxious. Fortunately, a friend referred us to Dr. Jariwala, and visiting his hospital turned out to be a game-changer.

After a thorough evaluation, Dr. Jariwala reassured us that we could safely wait a week before proceeding with a Ligasure surgery—an advanced technique that proved to be highly effective. This method minimized pain for my wife, ensured a swift recovery, and resulted in remarkably low blood loss. The surgery itself was seamless and efficient. I even had the privilege of being on a video call with my wife during the procedure, witnessing the magical moment our baby was born live—an unforgettable and heartwarming experience.

The staff at Jariwala Hospital deserve equal praise. Their humility, kindness, and soft-spoken nature created an atmosphere that felt more like home than a hospital. Transparency is clearly a priority here, with all charges openly displayed on a board in the reception area, fostering trust and clarity for patients. The hospital itself is impeccably clean and well-maintained.

Our experience was nothing short of extraordinary: we arrived at 11 AM, the surgery took place at 11:57 AM, and by 12:07 PM, I was holding our healthy baby in my arms. By 2:30 PM, my wife was already up, walking, and doing light exercises. We were discharged by 4:00 PM and back home by 6:00 PM that same day, with my wife mobile and our baby thriving. Now, 15 days later, both mother and baby are doing wonderfully, with a recovery that has been impressively swift.

Overall, our time at Jariwala Hospital was exceptional. I wholeheartedly give Dr. Jariwala, his team, and the facility a 10/10. A truly superb experience!"

On June 2024 My wife
underwent a laparoscopic ovarian endometriosis cystectomy performed by Dr. Nirav Patel and Dr. Kinnari Amin, and I am extremely grateful for the care, skill, and professionalism both doctors demonstrated throughout the entire process.

From the first consultation, Dr. Patel and Dr. Amin took the time to clearly explain my condition, the surgical procedure, and what to expect before, during, and after the surgery. Their calm and reassuring manner immediately put me at ease and made me feel confident that I was in the best hands.

The laparoscopic approach was minimally invasive, which made the recovery much smoother than I expected. The post-surgery results have been truly life-changing—my pain has significantly reduced, and the discomfort I had been living with due to the endometriotic cysts has greatly improved.

Both doctors were attentive during follow-ups and made sure I was healing well, answering any questions I had with patience and care. Their dedication to patient well-being is truly commendable.

I highly recommend Dr. Nirav Patel and Dr. Kinnari Amin to anyone dealing with endometriosis or related gynecological issues.

Their expertise and compassionate approach made a challenging time much easier, and I am incredibly thankful for their support and skill.

top_reviews.author: Habibiyah Qadriyah
top_reviews.text: Hey there….I am from Ahmedabad. I was a patient of placenta previa. Earlier my case was with some other Gynecologist…but suddenly in the 7th month after I had heavy bleeding my case became critical…My weight was also very low and hemoglobin level had also gone down considerably. Along with this I had problem in breathing…and heartbeat became fast. Even after the 7th month I started having mild contractions. In 2-3 private hospitals my case was considered risky and I was referred to a Government Hospital. In this situation Bindu Ma’am took my case in hand from Bonita Gynec hospital.  And the way I was treated there from the 7th month onwards...I don't have words to express it. Bonita Ma'am treated me like a mother every time. Even the complete staff was supportive and caring. Be it day or night the Dr. and staff took complete care of us. Even whenever there was a need we were guided well on a call. It was very difficult that my pregnancy could reach the 9th month...but Ma'am's full support was there...and after one week was completed in the 9th month my cesarean was done....Even during the cesarean the support, care and behaviour of the staff there and especially Mehul Sir was incredible.  A healthy baby was delivered with great care and support. And discharge was done from there with great love. I would advise all of you to definitely visit the hospital once....Last but not the least.....Thank You so much to the entire staff of Bonita Gynec and Surgical Hospital.

I’ll never forget the doctor who stood by me during the hardest, most vulnerable hours of my life.

She wasn’t just a doctor—she became my lifeline.

When the pain felt unbearable and fear crept in, she was there—not just with medical care, but with kindness, strength, and love.

She looked into my eyes and told me, “You’re doing great.” And somehow, I believed her.

She wiped my tears, whispered words of courage, and held my hand like it was the most natural thing in the world. Like I wasn’t a stranger, but someone she truly cared about.

She stayed with me through the storm, reminding me with every breath that I wasn’t alone.

In that sacred moment when my baby came into this world, she was right there—smiling, crying, celebrating with me.

You were a light in my darkness, a calm in my chaos.

Thank you for being my angel when I needed one the most.

top_reviews.text: We are blessed with a healthy baby boy weighing 3.15 kg! Heartfelt thanks to the energetic and enthusiastic nursing staff who took great care of us during our 2.5-day stay. top_reviews.author: Tanushree Dasgupta
top_reviews.text:
Incredible and a fantastic experience !

I don't even know where do I begin with ?
I had an incredible and an amazing experience with Dr. Viral Thekdi throughout my pregnancy and delivery. I was having a very high risk pregnancy due to PIH (Pregnancy Induced Hypertension) which generally leads to health hazards like placental rupture and convulsions. But Dr. Viral handled the situation very calmly, intelligently and with a smile on his face always. The decision making capacity of Dr. Viral along with his diligence and sincereness is something highly appreciable. He was available all the time for me and always kept a track of my blood pressure; he assured his presence in case of any emergency. My baby was very safely delivered by Dr. Viral in the presence of a highly qualified team of anesthetist, a pediatrician and a very supportive and kind squad of nurses and staff of Keshav Hospital.  Honestly speaking Dr. Viral Thekdi has been god to me and my husband. The staff and nurses are highly efficient and well mannered. My journey has been amazing and nothing short of a dream. The temperament, behavior, problem solving ability, listening skills and assurance attribute of Dr. Viral Thekdi is what makes him very special and class apart. Even a zillion of gratitude and thankfulness would be less in front of the experience that I've gained under his supervision. Within 4 days I was well recovered and there was no pain. Not only through pre - delivering; but Dr. Viral also made sure that my post partum healing and improvement falls in to place; keeping in mind to bring down the Blood Pressure after delivery and giving appropriate and correct amount of medicines for my healing journey.
I am truly blessed to have chosen Dr. Viral Thekdi and Keshav Hospital to be a part of my pregnancy and delivery journey which was indeed magical !

top_reviews.author: Dr. Sunil Mashru
top_reviews.text:
Our experience at Flowrence Hospital under the care of Dr. Amitaben Bhatt and Dr. Shaival Bhatt was exceptional. As first-time parents, my wife, Smitu, and I were both excited and anxious when we visited the hospital for the first time in March 2024. We had heard that both doctors are outstanding gynecologists, widely recognized in the Saurashtra region, and our experience confirmed this reputation.

From the very first visit, Dr. Amitaben Bhatt provided us with invaluable guidance. She explained each stage of the pregnancy in such a caring and clear manner, making us feel at ease and well-prepared. Every time we returned for a check-up, both doctors treated us with warmth and patience, answering our questions with a calm and reassuring approach. Their expertise was especially evident on November 4, 2024, when my wife went into labor early in the morning. The nursing staff greeted us warmly and treated us with the utmost care, which was especially impressive considering it was during Diwali vacation.

Dr. Shaival Bhatt was committed to ensuring a safe and healthy delivery. Although we were open to a cesarean if necessary, Dr. Shaival made every effort for a normal delivery and succeeded, much to our gratitude. Following the birth, she provided essential guidance on caring for our newborn and new mother, offering valuable advice with compassion and understanding. The nursing staff was attentive and supportive throughout, always ready to help us with a kind and patient approach.

The facilities at Flowrence Hospital were excellent, with an on-site laboratory and pediatrician, ensuring everything we needed was available. The staff, from reception to security, were well-trained, courteous, and genuinely caring, which made us feel welcome and comfortable at every step.

Dr. Shaival Bhatt and Dr. Amitaben Bhatt’s frequent check-ups after delivery showed their dedication to patient well-being. We left the hospital deeply satisfied, not only with the top-notch care but also with the surprisingly reasonable billing that brought a smile to our faces.

Being first-time parents can be overwhelming, but the expertise and guidance from both doctors truly relieved our stress. Flowrence Hospital offers premium care at an affordable rate, and I highly recommend it to anyone seeking doctors with a genuinely humane approach to patient care. Dr. Amitaben and Dr. Shaival Bhatt’s ethical, compassionate service is a gift to society, and we are grateful to have had them on this journey with us.

top_reviews.author: Sahil Sagpariya
top_reviews.text: Naari Women's Hospital in Rajkot is a trusted center for women’s healthcare, specializing in maternity and gynecological services. The hospital is led by experienced gynecologists Dr. Khushbu Zalavadia and Dr. Pratik Bhadaja. Patients appreciate the hospital's clean, modern facilities and compassionate care. It is well-regarded for managing high-risk pregnancies and providing advanced infertility treatments. The staff is attentive, ensuring personalized care for each patient. Laparoscopic surgeries and preventive health check-ups are also offered. Many patients highlight the supportive environment and smooth delivery experiences. Appointment availability can sometimes be limited due to high demand. Overall, Naari Women's Hospital is a preferred choice for comprehensive women's health in Rajkot.

Recently I have visited thrice here with my wife. She was suffering from irregularities in menstrual cycle.

At first appointment Mrs. Sidapara performed Sonography & gave a week medicine course. When it doesn't worked. We revisited and discussed with Mr. Sidapara and he gave 21 days medicine course and this also didn't work.

Now condition was very serious and when we again visit her, she as a doctor gave a statement "ye to muze bhi samaz ni aa rha ky ho rha, ese hona ni chahiye" and gave some 7-8 test list asked to test and then I will let you know what to do next.

But this time we ignore this and visited another lady doctor. She was very supportive and gave a 5 days medicine course and now everything is FINE.

top_reviews.author: Day with shaju
top_reviews.text:
I am writing this review to express my deep dissatisfaction with the service at Satnam Hospital, particularly due to the behavior of one of the staff members named Thushar. His behavior was completely unprofessional, rude, and disrespectful. Instead of helping or showing care, he created unnecessary stress and discomfort during an already difficult time.

Such conduct is unacceptable, especially in a place meant for healing and care. Thushar’s attitude gave a very negative impression of the hospital and left us feeling extremely disappointed. Staff members should be trained to handle patients and their families with empathy and respect, but unfortunately, that was not our experience here.

Because of this incident, we will never recommend Satnam Hospital to anyone. A single staff member’s behavior can damage the trust people place in a hospital, and this experience has done exactly that for us.

We hope the hospital management takes immediate action to improve their staff's attitude and ensure patients are treated with dignity in the future.

top_reviews.author: Britto Shinto
top_reviews.text: I had a distressing experience at Satnam Hospital with a staff member named Thushar. His behavior was rude, disrespectful, and lacking in empathy. Hospitals should be places of compassion and kindness. I hope the hospital takes these concerns seriously and addresses the issue to ensure better care for patients.

Dr. Harshit M Gohil & Family

top_reviews.author: Kuldeep Baraiya
top_reviews.text:
My beloved nana was hospitalized here and sadly passed away. During this difficult time, we experienced something very distressing that must be addressed.

The hospital's ambulance service quoted us ₹100 per km to transport his body to our hometown, Jafrabad (around 160 km one way, 320 km round trip). They demanded ₹32,000, which is an exorbitant amount. We ended up hiring a larger, better-equipped ambulance from outside the hospital, and the total cost was only ₹6,000. This clear difference shows how the hospital is exploiting grieving families.

Hospitals should be places of compassion and care, not profit-driven institutions that take advantage of vulnerable people. Sadly, our experience at HCG Bhavnagar felt like the latter.

Moreover, I strongly urge the government to keep an eye on the pricing of hospital services, ambulance charges, medicines, and other essentials. There should be proper regulation to protect common people from such exploitation during already difficult times.

I hope the hospital and the authorities take this feedback seriously and bring necessary reforms so that no other family has to suffer like we did.

top_reviews.author: Surbhi Bam
top_reviews.text:
I had a very positive experience with Dr. Dipen Parekh, and I’m grateful for the care I received. My first delivery was a C-section, so I was anxious about my second delivery. However, thanks to Dr. Parekh’s expertise, support, and confidence, I was able to have a normal delivery this time — something I had really hoped for.

Throughout my pregnancy, the doctor and their staff was attentive, reassuring, and always available to answer any questions or concerns even on phone or what’s app.

One of the best decisions I made during labor was opting for an epidural, which made my journey much more comfortable and manageable. I’m fully satisfied with the treatment and care I received. I highly recommend Dr. Dipen Parekh to anyone looking for a knowledgeable, skilled, and experienced gynaecologist.

top_reviews.text: Hospital services are excellent. Staff behaviour is very polite. I visited hospital to see one of my relative. top_reviews.author: Rahul Ahir
top_reviews.text:
I want to express my heartfelt gratitude to Dr. Poonam madam and Dr. Samuel panara sir for their outstanding care and expertise during my wife recent surgery. I found both of them only through Google reviews, and trusting them with my wife health was one of the best decisions I’ve made.

From the very first consultation, both doctors made my wife feel heard, safe, and confident about the procedure. Their clear explanations, compassionate approach, and attention to every detail before and after surgery truly stood out. The surgery went smoothly, and I felt incredibly supported throughout the recovery process.

They not only treated my wife medical condition but also treated my wife with kindness, respect, and genuine care—something that is rare and deeply appreciated.

Thank you, Dr. Poonam madam and Dr. Samuel panara sir, for being so dedicated and for making such a difference in my wife life. I will always be grateful and highly recommend you to anyone looking for trustworthy and skilled doctors.

top_reviews.author: Dpain dobariya
top_reviews.text:
I had an excellent experience at KK Women’s Hospital for childbirth. The nurses and doctors were incredibly supportive, especially when it came to encouraging natural birth, which I truly appreciated. The doctors are also very pro-breastfeeding and do not promote powdered milk, which aligns with the hospital’s commitment to the best care for mothers and babies.

The hospital strictly follows American guidelines for vaccinations and other important protocols, which gave me peace of mind. The staff were consistently polite, helpful, and professional, and the hospital maintains high standards of hygiene throughout the premises and rooms. I also loved the calming, chill music played in the waiting area, which created a relaxing atmosphere.

I had an emergency at 3 a.m. during a heavy rainstorm, and I was amazed at how quickly and efficiently the hospital responded. The emergency care was prompt and well-handled, making me feel safe and supported during a stressful time.

I highly recommend KK Women’s Hospital to any couple planning to start their family. They provide excellent care and are truly dedicated to the well-being of both mother and baby. I’m incredibly grateful to everyone at KK Hospital for their outstanding care and support.

top_reviews.author: Nupur Chatterjee
top_reviews.text: It's our second generation that is getting delivered here at this nursing home. All our experiences have been extremely pleasant. The senior and junior doctors (Dr. Dipak and Dr. Anand Bhagde), have both been very genuine in their practices. They don't unnecessarily prescribe you with long list of medicines. Instead, just as much as actually needed.  The team is not business-minded. They do care for the patients. Covid protocols are also maintained even at the labour room. Hygiene standards, especially in the labour room, has also improved considerably. The staff is well-trained under the able guidance of the Doctors. The sub-staff is also very polite and servile. Just one con: wish it was placed at a better location than in that area. At times, it has the tendency to become congested.

top_reviews.author: Ajit Pampaniya
top_reviews.text: I recently visited a hospital that specializes in both gynaecology and orthopaedics, and I have to say, I was really impressed. The entire experience, from scheduling the appointment to the consultations, was smooth and efficient. I took my wife to see a doctor for some advice. The gynaecologist dr  I saw took the time to answer all my questions without rushing. She made me feel comfortable and really listened to my concerns. You can tell she’s knowledgeable and genuinely cares about her patients.On the orthopaedic side, I had a slight issue with my knee, and the doctor provided a thorough examination. He explained everything in a way that was easy to understand, and I appreciated that he talked me through the treatment options without pushing me into anything.The staff was friendly and helpful throughout the whole process, making the experience even better. The facilities were clean and well-maintained, which always helps ease any worries. Overall, I left feeling well taken care of and confident in the advice I received. If you're looking for good care in either of these specialties, I’d definitely recommend checking this hospital out!

top_reviews.author: Diya Nanda
top_reviews.text:
---
I visited Dr. Vinisha Nanda Katarmal’s skin clinic in Jamnagar for treatment for rough skin, and I’m extremely happy with the results. After following her prescribed medication and undergoing treatment, my skin became noticeably smoother and softer—much more than I expected, and I started seeing results in just a few sessions!

The staff is very welcoming and polite, which made the whole experience even better. Dr. Vinisha herself communicates clearly and professionally, and she explained everything about the treatment in detail, which made me feel confident and comfortable.

The clinic has a very cozy, clean, and hygienic atmosphere—you instantly feel at ease when you walk in.

I am totally satisfied with both the treatment and consultation. I would absolutely recommend her clinic to anyone looking for genuine and effective skincare solutions. Don’t hesitate—just go!

Rating: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)

---

Feel free to tweak it further if you’d like to add anything personal!

top_reviews.author: Abhishek Sharan
top_reviews.text: Great doctor. Very down to earth and accommodating to patients. I had huge tonsils, which was causing me interrupted sleep (obstructive sleep apnea) for last 10 years. I had visited several doctors in India, USA and UAE. However, they could not relate my sleep issues to tonsillitis. Finally Dr Bhavesh Mehta helped. He suggested surgery for tonsillitis, which significantly helped with my sleep. This in turn improved my overall health. Very grateful to meet him and be treated by him. Highly recommended.

I am writing this long review because it is need of an hour and specially recognising the efforts of Dr. Rujul Mam

It was our first delivery so we  were quite worried about the procedures and stuffs but from the very first day we got tremendous support from the Doctor mam and team.

They were periodically reviewing the progress and constantly sharing the output of the progress . The doctor and her team was very polite and generous to attend our all the queries. Our baby by the god's grace and support from the hospital team got delivered in the night at 2:00 AM and the team was there to support even at that time. And lastly and most importantly this hospital is budget friendly so for the middle class people like me got best treatment in the budget friendly cost.

I sincerely thanks to Dr. Rujul Mam and her team for making this possible and having my baby in this world. 😇

top_reviews.author: Ekta Vadaliya
top_reviews.text:
Outstanding Experience at Gokul Hospital, Junagadh

I had a wonderful and stress-free delivery experience at Gokul Hospital, Junagadh. I joined Gokul Hospital, Junagadh last month for my delivery, and I couldn't be more satisfied with the care and treatment I received. Dr. Vishal Vaishnani and Dr. Chandani Vaishnani are truly the best—both are experienced, kind, and incredibly supportive throughout the entire process. Their expertise, calm nature, and constant support gave me complete confidence during each visit.

The hospital is clean, well-maintained. The entire staff—from nurses to support team—was kind, helpful, and attentive to every need, especially during labor and post-delivery recovery.

Dr. Chandani Vaishnani was very encouraging and comforting during my delivery, and Dr. Vishal Vaishnani made sure that every check-up was thorough and informative.

top_reviews.author: Sabina Kureshi
top_reviews.text:
Very very bad experience 😔 😔
Please don't visit Dr. Jenil Chikani 🙏
Earlier we feel that Dr. Chikani is the best Gynec in town but after the worst experience we faced on 3rd Feb. 2025 it proved that he don't have enough practical knowledge about his work.
My sister was admitted on the same day at Diva Gynec hospital and Dr.Jenil Chikani suggested for Cesarian delivery, everything was fine a healthy baby girl was born but after the operation the condition of my sister became worst as the Dr. was unable to stop internal bleeding after the delivery and much of the blood was flown from the body and my sister became weak. After 2-3 hours again the Dr. took her to operation theatre and again they opened the stitches of C section done on the same day without any reports and no medical guidance was given to the patient and the family members but after the 2nd operation also the condition was same Dr. was unable to find out what went wrong with the patient after that the condition of the patient became worst and heart beat increases to 160 (bpm) and Dr. told us to take the patient to other hospital and at last he advised us to move to other city as the condition of the patient was very very critical.
Luckily by God's grace the patient is saved by other doctors but please it's a request 🙏 if u want to save ur near and dear ones DO NOT VISIT this unexperienced Dr. 🙏🙏

top_reviews.text:
I recently had the joy of welcoming my newborn son into the world on November 8, 2024, at Famcare Hospital, and I can’t say enough about the wonderful experience we had. My wife, Pinal, had a mildly complicated cesarean section, but thanks to the skilled, gentle care from Dr. Shruti, Dr. Kuldeep, and the entire team, everything went smoothly, and our son arrived safe and healthy.

From the moment we walked in, the staff at Famcare made us feel completely at home. Their warmth, friendliness, and genuine care made such a difference – it felt like being with family rather than in a hospital. Dr. Kuldeep and Dr. Shruti created an atmosphere of trust and comfort, which truly eased our minds during such an important moment.

Every step of the journey, from initial visits to delivery and recovery, was filled with both professionalism and a personal touch that made us feel cared for on every level. For anyone looking for excellent medical care in a setting that feels like home, I highly recommend Famcare Hospital. Thank you, Famcare, for filling this special experience with so much warmth and kindness!

top_reviews.author: heer patel
top_reviews.text:
*Updated Response*

1.	Staffing Violations: Your hospital lacks the essential staff required under medical regulatory norms. There were no trained professionals present at critical times, and more shockingly, even the basic support staff were missing during key moments of my treatment. This alone is a grave violation of healthcare standards.

2.	Absence During Emergency: On a crucial night, when I approached your hospital seeking urgent delivery-related assistance, neither the doctor nor any responsible staff member was available. This abandonment during a potential medical emergency speaks volumes about your institution’s unreliability and lack of readiness.

3.	False Claim About Bills: You brazenly stated that bills were provided, which is absolutely false. I openly challenge you to publish the said bills on this same platform if you truly believe your claim. I have documented proof, including a message from your hospital explicitly stating that “you will not be given a bill for a miscarriage.” This is not just unethical—it is unlawful. If you fail to either produce the bills or issue a public apology, I will be left with no choice but to pursue legal action. I am fully prepared to take this matter to court and let the judiciary evaluate your conduct.

4.	Breach of Confidentiality & Defamation: Referring to my profession and disclosing alleged private conversations with my husband is a blatant breach of doctor-patient confidentiality. It’s disgraceful that instead of addressing the concerns, you chose to engage in character assassination.

5.	Insensitive and Superstitious Justifications: Blaming “bad luck” for medical outcomes and branding patients as “not worthy” of your treatment exposes your hospital’s elitist and discriminatory mindset. No medical professional has the right to demean patients who raise legitimate concerns about their care.

6.	Lack of Basic Post-Abortion Care: During my abortion, no sanitary kit, gown, or even basic hygiene protocols were followed. This isn’t just neglect—it’s a violation of every standard operating procedure in women’s healthcare.

_____________________________________________

My experience with this gynecologist was very horrible.
This was my most painful check up ever.
The hospital failed to provide medical bills and treatment documents
When we asked for the bill, Dr. Darsan said that you should have said first that you want the bill, now you will not get the bill for the miscarigae
They were not ready to give me any bill for any injection and also created false obstacles
They did not provide any
type of kit and clothes during my abortion
I have not seen any woman delivery during 3 months, and I have not seen any pregnant woman who has passed 7 to 8 months.
Avoid this hospital at all costs!

top_reviews.author: Chirag Prajapati
top_reviews.text:
Below points I would like to share.

1) She gives sufficient time to her patients.
2) Regarding vaccinations, we had the opportunity to consult better doctors in this case.
3) She believes in home remedies for children, which is a very positive aspect.
4) She is very polite, as far as I know. Personally, we have never faced any issues with her.
5) She is always punctual. And it is very helpful point when we are in hurry to checkup.
6) This clinic does not provide 24-hour services. I believe the doctor should give her contact card to patients so they can reach her during emergencies. Normally, we don’t always know when we might need to take our children to the hospital.
7) Her advice has always worked well for us.

These are my personal views, which may differ from others, of course.

Thank you 🙏🏻

top_reviews.author: Bindesh Prajapati
top_reviews.text:
We had great faith in Dr. Nimesh from his time at Himalaya, which is why we decided to visit Parul Hospital for gynecology-related guidance. Unfortunately, our experience with the hospital’s management was quite disappointing. The biggest issue lies with their receptionist and appointment system. You simply cannot meet Dr. Nimesh unless you take an appointment 2–3 days in advance. Even in urgent situations concerning women’s health, they are completely inflexible and uncooperative.

If you try to visit for any personal or urgent discussion, they outright reject your request and ask you to come back after a few days. This kind of rigid system is not at all suitable for someone needing immediate medical advice from a trusted doctor. We were highly disappointed with the hospital's management and scheduling process. No complaints about Dr. Nimesh himself—he’s a great doctor—but the way the hospital handles appointments really lets patients down.

top_reviews.author: Kirti Mathur
top_reviews.text:
Dr. Arpan Shah is a beacon of excellence in the field of diabetes care. His expertise, coupled with his compassionate approach to patient care, sets him apart as a remarkable healthcare professional. My father was under his care, and I can attest to Dr. Shah's diligence and commitment to ensuring the best possible outcomes for his patients.

From the moment we stepped into his office, Dr. Shah's warmth and attentiveness were evident. He took the time to thoroughly understand my father's medical history, concerns, and lifestyle factors, allowing for a personalized treatment plan tailored to his needs.

Throughout the course of my father's treatment, Dr. Shah consistently demonstrated a deep understanding of diabetes management, providing invaluable guidance on medication, diet, and lifestyle modifications. He ensured that my father felt empowered and supported in managing his condition effectively.

What truly stood out about Dr. Shah was his accessibility and willingness to address any questions or concerns we had. He fostered a sense of trust and open communication, which greatly eased our worries and instilled confidence in his care.

Thanks to Dr. Shah's expertise and dedication, my father's health has improved significantly, and he now leads a more fulfilling life despite his diabetes diagnosis. I cannot recommend Dr. Arpan Shah highly enough to anyone seeking exceptional diabetes care. He is a true asset to the medical profession, and I am immensely grateful for the positive impact he has had on my father's well-being.
